a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of GDP per capita spent by the government on each primary
school student vs. GDP per capita, 2018
GDP per capita data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices.
Government expenditure per student, primary (% of GDP per capita)
Data source: World Bank - Women, Business and the Law (2024); World Bank (2023)
